p: Fingolimod is primarily metabolized by CYP4F2 [ 79]. Since few drugs are metabolized by CYP4F2, fingolimod is expected to have a relatively low potential for drug-drug interactions. However, it should be used with caution when combined with class Ia and III anti-arrhythmic agents and beta-blockers [ 80]. CYP4F2 genotypes were observed contributing to both warfarin clearance and sensitivity differences [ 79].
